page.title: 10Teachers' strike.
page.content: {Children were sent home}from secondary and some primary schools because teachers{stepped up strike {action}for more pay. Primary schools are being hit more than secondary through the teachers' action. {School canteens are losing money from the strike, and in some schools cakes are being given away for 5 or 6 pence each. 200 teachers will take strike action in the Sidcup area. Around{150 teachers failed to turn up {at 11 schools}in the borough in pursuit of their extra pay: Â£1200 p.a. Bexley N.U.T. secretary Dennis Sale said he{regretted the action}but added "We will take further strike action over the coming weeks as this is the only way teachers can express their depth of feeling." The council would {attempt to keep schools open}for as long as possible.
